metadata.description: When the spread of the deadly Sanctus plague decimates the established government, people turn to the Church, and  Pope Augustus for sanctuary.  Unbeknownst to the populace, Pope Augustus is a sadistic and power obsessed bastion of evil.  As the Dark Pope's ambitions amplify, only an ex-cop, an eight year old girl, and her foul-mouthed possessed rag doll, stand alone against the onslaught of the Dark Pope, and his army of Shadowmen.
metadata.name: Sanctus
